entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 32 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 PM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 PM CST Friday 06 January 2023
